attributes.action: Fully investigate fradulent MP's Expenses claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fully investigate fradulent MP's Expenses claims, whether it was "within the rules or not", there needs to be some stron action against those that have abused the system for there own personal gain.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
